mapper.select: select orders.o_no, listagg(stock.s_name, ',') within group(order by stock.s_no) as s_name, to_char(orders.o_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') o_date, to_char(orders.o_deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD') o_deadline, orders.o_flag from orders, stock where orders.s_no = stock.s_no and o_flag != 0 and b_no = 1 group by orders.o_no, orders.o_date, orders.o_deadline, orders.o_flag order by orders.o_date

select orders.o_no, listagg(stock.s_name, ',') within group(order by stock.s_no) as s_name, to_char(orders.o_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') o_date, to_char(orders.o_deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD') o_deadline, orders.o_flag from orders, stock where orders.s_no = stock.s_no and o_flag != 0 and b_no = #{b_no} group by orders.o_no, orders.o_date, orders.o_deadline, orders.o_flag order by orders.o_date

Select count(*) From( select orders.o_no, listagg(stock.s_name, ',') within group(order by stock.s_no) as s_name, orders.o_date, orders.o_deadline, orders.o_flag from orders, stock where orders.s_no = stock.s_no and o_flag != 0 and b_no = #{b_no} group by orders.o_no, orders.o_date, orders.o_deadline, orders.o_flag order by orders.o_date)

select o.b_no, o.s_no, s.s_size, s.s_price, s.s_cost, o.o_flag, o.o_amount, o.o_date, o.o_deadline, o.o_no, s.s_name, s.s_origin from ORDERS o, STOCK s WHERE o.s_no = s.s_no and o.o_flag != 0 and o.o_no = #{o_no} order by o.s_no asc

Select count(*) From(select o.b_no, o.s_no, s.s_size, s.s_price, s.s_cost, o.o_flag, o.o_amount, o.o_date, o.o_deadline, o.o_no, s.s_name, s.s_origin from ORDERS o, STOCK s WHERE o.s_no = s.s_no and o.o_flag != 0 and o.o_no = #{o_no} order by o.s_no asc)
